page.title: 14ROXWELL CONCRETE WORKS
page.content: If you are building your own home you can buy concrete direct from Readymix works. You can either provide your own transport or hire one of their drivers and his lorry. The gravel comes from a pit nearby and they mix the gravel and the sand in hoppers after loading them onto conveyor belts. In case of emergencies there are a variety of safety measures which stop the machinery instantly. There are a variety of different sized stones depending on the type of concrete you need and the sand and stones are mixed with cement to make concrete. The water is added from a separate direction and the concrete is then readymixed for whatever use the customer requires.
